data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Amran who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Amran, Yemen
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Amran, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Father, help the 28 believers in Amran to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 134,372 lost friends and neighbors.
Jesus, please help the 28 believers in the state of Amran to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Jew, Yemeni people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Amran.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 28 believers in Amran, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.section_summary:
the state of Amran, Yemen has a population of 134,400.

We estimate Amran has 28 people who might know Jesus, 239 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 134,133 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4,799 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Amran.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.
